name: 狱焰王
description: 传说中的地狱犬王，身体核心燃烧着据说能融化一切的白色烈焰。只服从于真正强大的训练师。

features: 三层火焰鬃毛：外红中橙内白
身体上有裂痕透出岩浆光芒

ecology.habitat: 火山口深处和地下熔岩洞穴
prey: 任何敢于挑战它的生物

image_prompts.design: A massive hellhound with three-layered flame mane - red outer, orange middle, white core. Lava cracks across its body emit light, blue-white flames on its fangs, molten lava tail. Low poly style with faceted geometric surfaces, sharp edges defining the powerful form, ink sketch texture on lava patterns, non-reflective surface with matte dark tones, imposing and terrifying presence.
